title: en tAi vAzhgavE
sahitya:
en tAi vAzhgavE en tAi vAzhgavE shakti


anupallavi

  santatam anbarin cintaiyil viLangiDum


caraNam 1    tEnilum pAlinum vAnamudattinum gAnarasam pozhi jnAna kalAnidhi
    caraNam 2    kUTraiyum vIzhttiDum Atralum AyuLum Etramum nalguvAn pOTri mahA kALi
    caraNam 3    maNNaga vAzhvinil viNNamudam pozhi taNNaruL sheyyum mukkaNNan parAshakti
